abstract: Unemployment benefits are a necessary lifeline for people who lose their jobs, but -- especially in a tough economy -- they can also create big expenses for companies that are already struggling. Fortunately, there are ways to control the costs.

headline.main: Are You Managing Your Unemployment Insurance?
